name: Pyrite Pile
description: The Pyrite Pile resembles a mound of gold nuggets, making it elusive and deceptive.
memorable: Its ability to charm nearby creatures creates a unique battlefield dynamic.
goals: To lure adventurers with its appearance and absorb their valuables.
relations: Related to other elemental creatures and potential treasure guardians.
environment: Often found in caves or areas rich in precious metals.
strengths: High hit points and strong melee attacks; immune to many conditions.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence and Wisdom make it easy to outsmart.
attacks: Relentless slam attacks that grapple opponents and deal ongoing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Gold Fever charms nearby humanoids, enticing them to approach.
senses: Has tremorsense up to 60 feet, allowing it to detect movement.
skills: Has poor perception skills, making it less aware of its surroundings.
additional_information: Resistant to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
Immune to exhaustion, paralysis, petrification, poisoning, and unconsciousness.
Can absorb and destroy precious metals to regain hit points.
test_queries: golden mound monster with charm ability
creature that consumes metal and gold
strong monster that grapples and deals damage
